page.title: 15Burnhope Community Centre
page.content: Burnhope Community Centre is very popular.We visited the centre.The centre is open every day and is well used by a cross section of the community.There are 6 rooms altogether- 3 community rooms,a lounge,a hall and a kitchen.A typical week is Monday -Playgroup,Chiropody, Ladies Club and Dancing Club.Tuesday - Toddlers group,Library,Bingo (lounge) Karate (hall).Wednesday- Playgroup, Bowls.Thursday- Baby Clinic,Dancing Class,Labour Party.Friday-Executive Meeting,Senior Dancing Class.Saturday- Church Fayre,Childrens parties,Cricket teas,etc,Junior youth club.Sunday- Senior Youth Club. There are facilities for playing carpet bowls, snooker,pool and table tennis.There is a karate class but,as yet,no outdoor games are provided for.
